project_plan.name: Basic Data Analysis on CSV File in Python
project_plan.description: Implement a program that performs basic data analysis on a CSV file, calculating and displaying the mean, median, and mode for specified numerical columns.

task.name: Set up the project structure and environment
Implement feature to read CSV file input from the user
Implement feature to identify numerical columns in the CSV file
Implement calculation of mean for specified numerical columns
Implement calculation of median for specified numerical columns
Implement calculation of mode for specified numerical columns
Write tests for each of the features above
Execute tests on all implemented features to ensure that they function correctly
